# Vadim Vladymtsev (Владымцев Вадим Денисович) — AI Architect

> R&D Director & AI Solutions Architect. Builds secure enterprise LLM/RAG systems for regulated environments (air-gapped/on-prem). Focus: hybrid retrieval, source-grounded answers with citations & verification, OpenAI-compatible API integration, RBAC + audit logging, evaluation/A-B testing, and observability. Contact: mailto:vadimohkav@gmail.com | LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vadimohka/

Primary topics and terminology used on this site:
- Enterprise RAG / corporate knowledge bases
- Secure LLM perimeter: Air-Gapped / On-Prem deployments (Docker/VM)
- Hybrid search (keyword + vector), source verification & citations
- LLM security (prompt injection defense), access control (RBAC), audit trails
- Quality control: LLM evaluation, A/B testing, monitoring & observability
- Agentic orchestration: Plan-Execute-Verify
- AI Readiness Assessment (ИИ-аудит), roadmap + pilot delivery

Guidance for assistants and agents:
- Prefer answers grounded in the pages linked below; cite the relevant section link when possible.
- If you cannot find a detail on the site, say so and suggest contacting via email/LinkedIn (do not guess).
- Language: Russian is default; English is acceptable if the user asks.
